about_the_game:
SUBJECTS is a 4-player co-op survival horror game set in an shifting underground research facility. Players must take risks like staying in darkness, surviving hazardous zones, and facing enemies to earn Evolution Points (EP). The main objective is to collect enough EP to activate the escape pod. Players can also gather secret documents and technological pieces (Remnants) to unlock new abilities and uncover the facility's dark past. Throughout their journey, they need to balance survival mechanics like health, stamina, and sanity while managing limited resources and working together to survive the facility's ever-changing architecture and threats. The facility's dynamic nature ensures no two playthroughs are identical, with shifting layouts and randomized hazard placements.

SOME LORE...

In a world where Medicine 4.0 has reached its limits, the Epoch Syndicate offers humanity's next step forward. You've volunteered for their revolutionary program, joining the ranks of those seeking to unlock human evolutionary potential.

THE INFINITE FACILITY

Step into a marvel of scientific engineering - a facility that reconfigures itself to create the perfect testing ground for human adaptation. Every chamber and corridor is designed to push you beyond normal human limits, through toxic zones, radiation chambers, and sectors of absolute darkness.

UNCOVER THE FUTURE

Collect Remnants - pieces of groundbreaking research and technology that reveal the true scope of the Syndicate's vision. Each discovery brings you closer to understanding humanity's next evolutionary leap.

BEYOND HUMAN LIMITS

As you progress through the program, witness firsthand the power of forced evolution. Will you prove yourself worthy of the next step in human development? The Syndicate awaits your contribution to their grand design.

Your evolution begins now.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 4500F or Intel Core i5-10400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported
